titleStmt.title: A playne demonstration of Iohn Frithes lacke of witte and learnynge in his vnderstandynge of holie scripture and of the olde holy doctours, in the blessed sacrament of the aulter, newly set foorthe by Iohn Gwynneth clerke.
titleStmt.author: Gwynneth, John.

titleStmt.title: A playne demonstration of Iohn Frithes lacke of witte and learnynge in his vnderstandynge of holie scripture and of the olde holy doctours, in the blessed sacrament of the aulter, newly set foorthe by Iohn Gwynneth clerke.
titleStmt.author: Gwynneth, John.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Frith, John. A boke made by John Frith prisoner in the tower of London (STC 11381).
Running title reads: A demonstracion of Frithes ignorance.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
